2020-05-13T20:00:00Z: Today in Mississippi there are 182 new COVID-19 cases being reported by the MSDH and 8 new deaths. This brings the total number of cases in Mississippi to 10090 and 465 deaths. 
 Today in the US the CDC is reporting 20420 new cases and 1693 deaths. This brings the total number of positive cases to 1382304 and a total of 78343 deaths.
2020-05-13T20:00:00Z: Today in Mississippi there are 182 new COVID-19 cases being reported by the MSDH and 8 new deaths. This brings the total number of cases in Mississippi to 10090 and 465 deaths. 
 Today in the US the CDC is reporting 20420 new cases and 1693 deaths. This brings the total number of positive cases to 1382304 and a total of 78343 deaths.
